Description: Sherd from base of Aeolian grey ware pottery open work stand; exterior: very worn dark grey slip; plastic decoration consisting of feline foot to right resting on double plastic ridge at lower edge of base; punched dots on skin.
Curator's comments: Sherd probably belongs with British Museum 1888,0601.637 and 1965,0930.441, and perhaps 1888,0601.639.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GL.111)
